tag_list: jordan, macleod, money, cloud, strue, software, evolution, values, security, financial, global, cornerstone, new-currency
overview:
Jordan MacLeod is founder of a stealth startup and is a founder and partner in a London-based strategic consultancy, Cornerstone Global Associates. He is the author of New Currency: How Money Changes The World As We Know It.

His current focus is in the areas of digital security, the evolution of monetary and value systems, and leading a New Economics Unit at Cornerstone.
